title: Massive ping spike whenever protobelt was activated
body: hey so i just had a game where i would get a huge ping spike whenever the enemy ahri or evelynn would use their protobelts. it would last for 3-5 seconds and was pretty annoying. not sure if its packet loss or if its proto belt causing this. i was playing as Karma if that helps at all

replies.body:
If the delay is being caused by a single item then it's possible that you're having an FPS problem and not necessarily with your connection.  Your computer might be having problems rendering game files, but I'd like to rule this out as a possibility.  

We have an [FPS Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help get this fixed.  As a first step which is included in the guide, I recommend updating your graphics driver and possibly repairing corrupt game files.  Let me know if your issue persists afterwards!
